labInstructions.title: Lab 9
labInstructions.content:
Finish up the app

The last things that need to be done. See the Konva documentation for help.

  • Wire up the color select so it changes the color of the brush when change the select tool
  • The clear button should work. The code below will help.
function clearCanvas(evt) {
    evt.preventDefault();
    stage.clear();
    stage.clearCache();
    initKonva();
}s
